com.percussion.filter
Class DefaultPasswordFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.filter.DefaultPasswordFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSExtension, IPSPasswordFilter
public class DefaultPasswordFilter
extends Object
implements IPSPasswordFilter

This class will use a default encrypting scheme to encrypt passwords for various Rhythmyx security providers.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(String[] args)

encrypt

public String encrypt(String pw)
This method is called by the Rhythmyx security provider before authenticating a user. The password submitted in the request is run through this filter, then checked against the stored password character-for-character.

Specified by:
encrypt in interface IPSPasswordFilter
Parameters:
password - The clear-text password to be encrypted. Never null.
Returns:
A string containing the encrypted password. Never null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If any param is invalid.

init

public void init(IPSExtensionDef def,
                 File f)
Description copied from interface: IPSExtension
Initializes this extension.

Note that the extension will have permission to read and write any files or directiors under codeRoot (recursively). The extension will not have permissions for any other files or directories.

Specified by:
init in interface IPSExtension
Parameters:
def - The extension def, which contains configuration info and initialization params.
f - The root directory where this extension should install and look for any files relating to itself. The subdirectory structure under codeRoot is left up to the extension implementation. Must not be null.
